oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Philip Sheridan cabinet card photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: General Phil Sheridan and his assistant, Crosby. Family lore states that these men were Federals who were looking for food and were not allowed in the house. "E. E. Henry, Photographic Artist, 42 Delaware Street, Leavenworth, Kansas" is printed on the back of the image.
